creator: linczakjw@hiram.edu
text:
It seems that I cannot add the same username to two different publications
without closing down Mozilla (using version 1.6) and reopening it.  Here are the
steps to reproduce this error:

1.  Open up Mozilla 1.6.
2.  Go to a Lenya installation and login as an admin to one publication (labeled
here as X)
3.  Add a new user (using username, full name, email address, and password)
4.  Log out of publication X.
5.  Without closing browser, login as an admin into another publication (labeled
here as Y)
6.  Add a new user using the same criteria as in step 3 above.
7.  Publication Y will not allow the new user, stating that the user already exists.

Closing the Mozilla web browser and opening it back up, logging into Publication
Y and adding the user again produces no errors.  I have not tested this with
other browsers.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The request URL was saved as a global variable and not re-initialized in the
flowscript. That's why, it still used the URI from the first publication in the
second publication. The wrong AccessController was resolved.

This was fixed in CVS after 1.2 was released.
